Meet the Team
-------------

We are a team of 3 graduate students in the [Master of Urban Spatial Analytics program](https://www.design.upenn.edu/musa/about) at the University of Pennsylvania. This project was completed as our final project for [MUSA550: Geospatial Data Science in Python](https://musa-550-fall-2023.github.io/). To learn more about this [project](https://github.com/LuckyLaharlTim/MUSA_5500_Final) or our other work, please reach out to our team below:
